About

Nut brushes family was founded by two friends with the shared passion for bouldering.

Our project came to life in 2017 in northern Italy, with the precise intention to help to preserve the climbing spots we love and learnt to call home.

Our mission is to deliver the highest quality and most durable brushes with a never-ending attention to reduce the environmental impact of our manufacturing process and final products.

Marking and materials can be optionally personalized upon request.

#cleanyourline

All our brushes are entirely handmade, starting from premium 100% boar bristles and a selection of the finest certified wood from all over the world.
No paint is used, what you see is the natural wood color!.

NutBrushers

@Daniel Woods

- Professional Climber -

Lead

Boulder

Rock Climbing

Laura Rogora nata a Roma, il 28 aprile 2001, è un'arrampicatrice italiana. Pratica le competizioni di difficoltà, boulder e speed, l'arrampicata in falesia e il bouldering.

Corda: Il 28 febbraio 2016, a soli 14 anni, diviene la prima arrampicatrice italiana ad aver salito una via di 9a, con la ripetizione di Grandi Gesti a Sperlonga.

Il 22 agosto del 2020 arriva il primo oro mondiale nella massima categoria, con la vittoria della Coppa del Mondo di Lead a Briançon.

Boulder: A livello italiano ha vinto il Campionato italiano boulder di arrampicata 2015-2016

@Laura Rogora

Bio
